Label: CT 104: Long position of a 5-year Coupon Bearing Bond star
Description: Long position of a 5-year Coupon Bearing Bond starting at 01/02/2015 with Notional of 1000. Coupon payments are made annually at fixed Nominal Rate of 2% using Day Count Convention 30/360.
